ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Roberts,Ed Decker,Greg Horn,Lee Larkins,Mark Heike,Rik Levins
ComicInfo.Summary: All Color!!! The girls go all introspective as Jennifer and Joan individually agonize about their broken relationships, She-Cat chastises Dusty for her friendship with Jen's estranged husband, the Vault Heroes get some training in modern criminology, and Synn 'n Nightveil try to take Jetgirl into the Limbo Void, just for kicks. When Tara returns to her old stomping grounds of Jungle Island, poison from an old booby trap sends Tara hallucinating through some weird adventures. But it all turns out okay, as it helps Tara to decide to rededicate herself to her environmental causes. "Same As It Never Was" is written by Mark Heike, inked by Michael White and drawn by Norb Frydrych, Dave Roberts, Lee Larkins, Armando Baez, Greg Horn, and Ed Decker. Guest starring Paragon, Kitten, Yankee Girl, Jetgirl, General Gordon, Randall Crowley, T. C. Fremont, and Janis Lawson. And in the back-up, Dragonfly confronts FF movie producer Mike Frankovich Jr., only to learn that the only way she'll get any screen time is if she takes a bit part acting a roll in the movie- playing Colt!! "No Room Left On The Gravy Train", written by Mark Heike, drawn by Dave Roberts, and inked by Chris Allen. Guest starring Mark Heike, Dave Roberts and Bill Black. Color cover by Rik Levins and Mark Heike, full color throughout. Standard comic book format.
ComicInfo.Title: No Room Left on the Gravy Train Part Two; Same as It Ever Was!
